section.title: Block Storage sample configuration files
section.para: All the files in this section can be found in /etc/cinder.

section.title: cinder.conf
section.para: Use the cinder.conf file to configure the majority of the Block Storage service options.

section.title: api-paste.ini
section.para: Use the api-paste.ini file to configure the Block Storage API service.

section.title: policy.json
section.para: The policy.json file defines additional access controls that apply to the Block Storage service.

section.title: rootwrap.conf
section.para: The rootwrap.conf file defines configuration values used by the rootwrap script when the Block Storage service must escalate its privileges to those of the root user.
